page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the area there are the usual community jobs, such as Police, Nurses, Teachers, Shop assistants etc. But the main sources of employment are as follows: Firstly, Hydro Electricity Board. The Hydro Board has an underground power station about five miles from Dalmally. The power station uses water from Loch Awe to generate power. Secondly, The Forestry Commission employs several people in the area. They are involved in planting and caring for the trees in the area. There is also a Economic Forestry plantation. Thirdly British Rail employs people to maintain the line and man the local stations.
